* Make: Asus
* Model: S5N (a.k.a. S5200N)

=== Current Issues ===

* Hibernate / suspend-to-disk fails to resume (#46303)
* SD card reader unsupported (#36964)
* Side scrolling on touchpad doesn't work (#40021)
* A few of the special "Fn key" sequences don't do anything
